page.title: 06SELATTYN SCHOOL
page.content: Selattyn school is a primary school. It is the only primary school in the whole of our domesday area. There are 46 children in the school.There are two classes the teachers are Mrs Mostyn an Mr Evans. We have a modern cloak room with toilets for girls and boys. We have a small kitchen and we have our dinner in Mrs Mostyns class because it is the largest classroom. The present school was built about {1860}it has high windows with red bricks around the windows but the rest is stone . Mr Evans' class is quite small .We have one cleaner and two kitchen assistant and part secretary Mrs hird . We have a little bell out side in a little bell tower and we have agable ends all round the building . In the church records we found some information about the school it says in 1740 5th may the
